overview: This volume of Jail Babes marks a new chapter in our quest to bring you hot chicks with bad attitudes and criminal pasts. In summary, the hardened street skanks that marked our earlier pseudo-documentaries have been retired (or locked back up). We've since issued a call to Porn Valley's top-shelf split tail, asking them to tell their stories for us and fuck on camera. They have answered that a call. These are their stories… we can't vouch for them… but they sure can fuck.
title: Jail Babes 19
